page.title: 16LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: LEISURE AND RECREATION the Crymlyn Bog and Kilvey Hill are open areas and as such are a magnet for all the children in the area. Th pursuits of children vary according to their intersets. Darren aged 11 I come here (Crymlyn Bog) at weekends with my older brother. He brings his shotgun and we go shooting rabbits. There are alot of them on Kilvey Hill and here. We don't shoot anything else. Sometimes a group of us come here on our BMX bikes. We make obstacles out of the rubbish and litter we find and make a sort of course. We all have to try to get around it in the fastest time.
